The Facebook post was published on March: 2020, and has been shared almost 300 times.
The Cwm Taf Morgannwg University Health: which manages the Princess of Wales Hospital, issued a statement denying the claim and stating that the advice has not been issued by them to their staff.
The World Health Organization has stated: 4. Research conducted by the US-based Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has shown that it is not yet known whether weather and temperature impact the spread of COVID-19.
